reviewText: I love Delta Burke and she is one of my favorite actresses. She is the ONLY reason I picked up this old Lifetime TV movie.  It was exactly like I figure it would be, cheesy, melodramatic and campy. It is awesome.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: Delta Burke plays an excellent role as a parent who is abused by her child. I never really gave this topic a thought and the movie brings to life just this fact...many probably don't think about this. Very eye opening about a controversial topic.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: and very true.  Alot of parents are afraid to displine their children. And when they don't this is the result. When Delta character had to finally defend herself and her littlest boy she seen how far she had let this go. Very Good Movie. As the bible say spare the rod spoiled the child. Displine is needed.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: Delta Burke is great in this movie trying to protect her eldest son from parent abuse. It's a great story with a good ending.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: You always here about parents abusind children but not in this movie! The rolls are reversed. A teenage boy becomes extremely abusive to his devorced mother. This is a reality movie. And what I mean is this is some thing that happens all of the time actually more and more but it really goes unseen. How often do you hear about a child abusing their parents? Thats what I thought. But in the movie, you will see how a mother struggles to overcome this ordeal. And you will see how anger really affects some and how others around them learn to lie about the bruises, loud crashing of things and the truth. Every parent who has ever had an abusive child could see them selves in this movie. It was a great lifetime movie.....
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: I saw this on Lifetime Movie. It's not fair,that the mother gets arrested for something she didn't do.It was the other son that beat up the other son.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: Scarey and full of suspense...Loved it. Delta was good in this movie, she played her part well. Its hard to believe that there are children that have this problem.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: Excellent story line!  The mother made you feel the pain of a mother with a child that's "different" and the child showed magnificent acting ability in his portrayal of a emotionally disturbed young person.  Acting realistic!  Very good!
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: Anyone with teenage children should watch this move.  It is based on a true story and helps you to understand what can happen and maybe how to handle it.
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: I bought this movie without having seen it previously, just because the premise was soooo intriguing. I may not be a psychologist, but I feel as if you can appreciate this film on a psychological level. It just goes to show you how manipulative and angry some children can be. It's a definite eye opener. Both Delta Burke and Ryan Merriman give top notch performances that keep you locked to the screen the entire time. Get a copy of this movie!! You won't regret it
Title: Dangerous Child

reviewText: I can't wait to watch this movie.  I haven't seen it before, but I know I will like it.  Perfect condition.
Title: Dangerous Child
